newsitem.title: FINLAND: CHIPS RISES, LIVELY IN-HOUSE AT AG.
newsitem.headline: CHIPS RISES, LIVELY IN-HOUSE AT AG.

text.p: Shares in Finnish snacks, plastics toys and packaging group Chips rose sharply in a large in-house trade at AG Private Bankers on Wedensday.
At 1625/1335 GMT, Chips stood at 360.00, up 15.00 markka or 4.35 percent, but trade was quiet after some 52,000 shares were brokered in-house at AG Private Bankers at 1437/1137 GMT.
AG had no comment on the deal, but one broker noted the share is very illiquid so vulnerable to large price swings.
